man women are always treated like fights in NTR but this one was awesome I had the hope that it would be tube right in the end I thought NtR would have a different ending from others I really wanted this to happen more the protagonist's girlfriend who was with happy life continued  to be yours from that other guy I really had in the hope that this would have the difference of having a happy ending but I super-timed him and in the end he like everyone else the author had in hand the chance to do it different but he chose to do the same thing  always, treating women like idiotic bitches .. (weakly it was a disappointment because in my opinion it didn't make sense the protagonist's girlfriend in the end throws his whole life away with his family after everything they went through to do the shit all over again).  .... I have nothing against NTR I read a lot of netorare but this could be the best because it gave so much hope that it would end more was more was just 1 more like all the othe.
